about_the_game:
“Dang dang dang—Dang!!”

“Dang dang dang—Dang!!”

Cast:

【The Red-Haired Demon of Siguo Village】【Forsaken Mint】【The Legend of Pass Canyon】

Ian, chosen as the male lead for his affordable fee, initially became discouraged when he learned his character would be a disabled yet determined man. By human standards, Ian is a formidable fighter, but unfortunately, his enemies are all far from human. As the indispensable lead, your task is to ensure he makes it to the end!

【The Relentless Survivor】The Big Sister Leader】【The Lost King of Pass Canyon】

Flame is a runaway lady both inside and outside the story. Don’t be fooled by her panda-like appearance into thinking she’s an easy target. She may seem tough, but beneath it all, she has a softer side. As your strongest ally in this journey, try to understand her heart and help her solve her dilemmas!

【I’m more than just a pretty face】【The Silent Bride】【The Wilderness Survival Girl】

Pupeti is a rising influencer brought into the project for her popularity, though her acting is subpar, so she’s been written as a “blank-slate” character. Her on-screen presence is striking, and she looks stunning in photos. Yet, deep down, she holds intense hatred and a desire for revenge. You’ll need to help her achieve it!

【The Early Bird King】【Polite and Refined】【Best Suited for Working in a Control Room】

Guy is a naturally talented actor who ended up with the wrong script but still works relentlessly, constantly pushing his physical limits. His dreams are lofty, but he's already found the key. Now, it’s up to you to help him fulfill his aspirations at any cost.

Story Overview:

Two fledgling boys, a simple mission, a bloody journey, a game of devouring each other. In the huge hunting ground, you may be a human weak as ant, a knight with a bloodbath, or a man-eating Forsaker, you eat or be eaten, you struggle to survive. But finally, your fate is controlled by others. Choose! Embrace or... Abandon.

Stage Overview:

【Exquisite Story, Crafted with Heart】

The stage is carefully constructed, with characters meticulously designed and a heartfelt plot, all crafted with great care and passion.

(The four instances of the word "heart" in this description show just how dedicated we are!)

【Seamless Experience, Lazy Mode】

Enjoy "Lazy Mode" that clears obstacles and provides the most uninterrupted storytelling experience.

(No battles required! This mode was added because the director couldn’t win the fights, so it's more like a "director's cut.")

【Casual Card Game, Brutally Cute】

A light "roguelike" with fun, low-effort card mechanics. Every time you play, it's a unique experience.

(It’s surprisingly enjoyable; after testing it, an entire day just flew by.)

Game Features:

【Reading Mode】

No battles, just sit back, enjoy the story, and breeze through to the ending!

【Heartwarming Story】
Over 200,000 words present a captivating, intricately woven narrative that lets you indulge in the joy of reading a novel.

【High-Quality Art】
A unique art style, stunning character illustrations, and a large number of CG images!

【Comforting Sound】
A timeless soundtrack that complements the story, offering a soothing reading experience.

【Rich Strategy】
Focus on steady development, gather power, and unleash devastating buffs! Mix and match with your allies, using every tactic to defeat the "Forsaken Creatures"!

Stage Crew Member：

【Staff】

Production Team：Sword Lantern

Producer：农夫卡卡萝

Script/Direction：农夫卡卡萝、丹哥

Copywriting：农夫卡卡萝

Copy Editing/Configuration/Production Assistance：农夫卡卡萝、丹哥、呆呆、大义

Setting Assistance：大义

Scene Concept Art：小Y

Character Concept Art：农夫卡卡萝、小Y

CG Concept Art：农夫卡卡萝、小Y

UI：农夫卡卡萝、小Y、大义

PV/Marketing Art：农夫卡卡萝、小Y

Level Design：呆呆

Programming：苏摩

Logisics：农夫卡卡萝、呆呆、小Y、苏摩、大义

External Assistance (We thank them deeply)：

Sound Direction：老郭

Music：重远、喜碧、峥峥

Sound Effects：乌芒

Animation：小云、小雄、柏云

Art Assistance：小川

Pre-production Assistance：吴老师

"We are deeply grateful for your support. This time, we simply wish to tell a good story."

                                                                                                                — Sword Lantern

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains some adult content elements:
Including partial nudity, a small amount of profanity, violent depictions, bloody, accidental deaths, and descriptions of horror scenes.

name: 弃种：叮叮与圣剑（Forsaker : DingDing&Blade）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD A10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Two young adventurers, a simple task, a bloody journey, a game of devouring each other. In this vast hunting ground, you may be a weak human, a knight fighting fiercely, or a forsaken. You eat, you are eaten, you struggle, but in the end, your fate is controlled by others. Embrace or discard.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Indonesian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean, Uzbek, Urdu, Armenian, Igbo, Sindhi, Sinhala, Croatian, Icelandic, Cherokee, Galician, Catalan, Afrikaans, Kannada, Luxembourgish, Hindi, Gujarati, Kyrgyz, Kazakh, Turkmen, K'iche', Kinyarwanda, Tajik, Serbian, Odia, Welsh, Konkani, Bangla, Nepali, Basque, Hebrew, Latvian, Tigrinya, Slovak, Slovenian, Swahili, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Georgian, Maori, Wolof, Bosnian, Persian, Telugu, Tamil, Irish, Estonian, Valencian, Belarusian, Quechua, Zulu, Xhosa, Lithuanian, Sotho, Sorani, Yoruba, Uyghur, Scots, Tswana, Filipino, Mongolian, Hausa, Dari, Azerbaijani, Amharic, Albanian, Assamese, Tatar, Macedonian, Marathi, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Khmer
